db:abstract.db:para: Calls moc on an input file.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: Creates a rule to call the Meta-Object Compiler (moc) on src_file and store the output in dest_file.

db:note.db:para: This is a low-level macro. See the CMake AUTOMOC Documentation for a more convenient way to let source files be processed with moc. qt5_wrap_cpp is also similar, but automatically generates a temporary file path for you.

db:section.db:title: Arguments
db:section.db:para: You can set an explicit TARGET. This will make sure that the target properties INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES and COMPILE_DEFINITIONS are also used when scanning the source files with moc.
